@statics/our_donors: As a non-profit organization, what would we be without you? Through the on-going support of our donors, Busy will keep evolving
@statics/busy_mission: The Busy project’s mission is to connect everyone to the next-gen decentralized social network that gives voice and value back to people, by building together a true sharing economy, a more free and trustworthy Internet without middleman
@statics/ensure_compensation: Ensuring compensation for the creators of value
@statics/busy_mission_2: Artists and User-generated content create billions dollars worth of value absorbed by the shareholders of these intermediaries and centralized services
@statics/busy_mission3: As a non-profit and decentralized organization, Busy provides the power of cryptocurrency and blockchain innovations within a platform that returns much of its value to the creators ensuring fair compensation
@statics/sharing_economy_2: Uber or Airbnb are often described as the sharing economy, a nice notion that peers create and share in value. But these businesses have little to do with sharing, they in fact simply aggregate as middleman through their centralized, proprietary platforms and do resell by taking huge commissions
@statics/sharing_economy_3: Today's big disrupters are about to get disrupted
@statics/sharing_economy_4: Busy aims to create a true peer-to-peer sharing economy without middleman and zero transaction fee that allows people to transact safely and freely
@statics/money_transfer_2: The largest flow of funds into the developing world is not foreign aid but remittance money repatriated to poor countries from their families living abroad
@statics/money_transfer_3: Using Western Union, Moneygram and other centralized services, the process takes time, patience and cost from 5 to 25% commission
@statics/money_transfer_4: Busy's goal is to end the remittance ripoff providing a digital wallet that allows everyone to send/receive digital money with no transaction fee
